title: Digital Design Laboratory
description: Experiments to analyze and design combinational and sequential logic circuits with discrete ICs and PLDs. Introduction to laboratory equipment such as the logic state analyzer for testing circuits. Introduction to a hardware description language for logic simulation and design. Not open to students with credit in CPE/EE 133. 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as CPE/EE 169.
prerequisites: An orientation course in student's major (EE 111 & EE 151 for EE students, CPE 100 for CPE students), CPE/CSC 101
